The Elder Aṅkola Flower’s Birth Story
having seen the flowering aṅkola tree,
I do not know of a bad destination,
this is the fruit of worshipping the Buddha.
I have done what the Buddha asked.”🔽Thus the elder Aṅkola Flower recited these verses.
